items.sentence: Tom is always getting people to do things for him.
Tom is better off than he was this time last year.
Tom is by no means unintelligent. He is just lazy.
Tom is in the kitchen, cutting up some vegetables.
I want my children to have the best of everything.
I want to find somewhere I can sit down and relax.
I want to get Tom something nice for his birthday.
Both drinking and smoking are bad for your health.
By the time we got there, it was already too late.
Tom told Mary that he\'d help her, but he didn\'t.
